name: nbbm.info Basketball Manager
description:
Simple PC management game of the best basketball league.

  • Take control of one of the 30 teams.
  • Play games, set up training and tactics, make transfers, sign contracts, select new players in the annual draft.
  • Take care of players condition and morale.
  • Every year preseason and regular season games will be played. Best teams will meet in playoffs.
  • Win the championship and create a dynasty.

visit nbbm.info homepage for more details
